column5: Through core modules, you will gain a deep understanding of how data science can inform and improve the decision making of individuals, firms and governments. You can tailor your degree with a range of optional modules and complete a dissertation where you will apply the methods you have learnt.With this Master’s degree from Newcastle University, you will have developed the skills necessary to excel as a:professional economistpolicy makeracademic researcherWe also offer the following economics courses:Economics MSc Behavioural and Experimental Economics MScEconomics and Finance MScWhat you'll learnGain advanced skills in economic theory. You'll also learn quantitative methods in econometrics and mathematical economics.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
